BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-StdCommands
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: General purpose commands always available in ChimeraX

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Selector :: sel :: selected atoms
Selector :: all :: everything
Selector :: pbonds :: pseudobonds
Selector :: hbonds :: hydrogen bonds
Selector :: hbondatoms :: hydrogen bond atoms
Command :: alias :: General Controls :: create shorthand version of command
Command :: alias list :: General Controls :: list command aliases
Command :: alias delete :: General Controls :: remove command alias
Command :: ~alias :: General Controls :: remove command alias
Command :: align :: Structure Comparison :: superimpose specific parts of structures
Command :: altlocs :: Structure Editing :: change/remove alternate atom locations
Command :: angle :: Structure Analysis :: Report or set angle between atoms/objects
Command :: camera :: Viewing Controls :: change "camera" parametrs of main viewing window
Command :: cartoon :: Depiction :: show stylized representation of structure
Command :: ~cartoon :: Depiction :: stop show stylized representation of structure
Command :: cd :: General Controls :: change ChimeraX's current working directory
Command :: clip :: Viewing Controls :: control clipping of models
Command :: ~clip :: Viewing Controls :: stop clipping of models
Command :: close :: General Controls :: close models
Command :: cofr :: General Controls :: set center of rotation
Command :: ~cofr :: General Controls :: revert to default center of rotation
Command :: color :: Depiction :: change model colors
Command :: colour :: Depiction :: change model colors
Command :: color delete :: General Controls :: delete custom color names
Command :: color list :: General Controls :: list custom color names
Command :: color name :: General Controls :: define custom color names
Command :: color show :: General Controls :: show definition of custom color names
Command :: colordef :: General Controls :: define custom color names
Command :: ~colordef :: General Controls :: remove custom color names
Command :: colourdef :: General Controls :: define custom color names
Command :: ~colourdef :: General Controls :: remove custom color names
Command :: coordset :: General Controls :: show specific coordinate set (a.k.a. frame or conformer)
Command :: crossfade :: Movie Making :: fade from one view to another
Command :: defattr :: General Controls :: set many Python attribute values for structure elements from a file
Command :: delete :: Structure Editing :: delete parts of a structure
Command :: dssp :: Structure Editing :: compute/assign secondary structure
Command :: exit :: General Controls :: quit ChimeraX
Command :: quit :: General Controls :: quit ChimeraX
Command :: fly :: General Controls :: interpolate motions for animations
Command :: graphics :: General Controls :: control 3D graphics parameters
Command :: hide :: Viewing Controls :: stop displaying (parts of) a model
Command :: ~show :: Viewing Controls :: stop displaying (parts of) a model
Command :: ~display :: Viewing Controls :: stop displaying (parts of) a model
Command :: lighting :: Viewing Controls :: change lighting
Command :: lighting model :: Viewing Controls :: change per-model lighting
Command :: material :: Depiction :: change visual surface properties of 3D objects
Command :: measure buriedarea :: Surface/Binding Analysis :: measure surface area buried by contacting structures
Command :: measure center :: Volume :: measure center of mass of maps or atoms
Command :: measure convexity :: Surface/Binding Analysis :: color surface based on local convexity
Command :: measure inertia :: General Controls :: measure moments of inertia
Command :: measure length :: Volume :: measure path length of connected markers
Command :: measure rotation :: Volume :: measure rotation of one model relative to another
Command :: measure symmetry :: Volume :: compute map symmetry
Command :: move :: General Controls :: move (parts of) a model relative to others
Command :: palette :: General Controls :: list available color palettes
Command :: perframe :: General Controls :: execute commands every frame
Command :: ~perframe :: General Controls :: stop execution of commands every frame
Command :: pwd :: Utilities :: report current working directory
Command :: rainbow :: Depiction :: "rainbow" color (parts of) structures
Command :: rename :: General Controls :: change name or ID of model
Command :: rmsd :: Structure Comparison :: measure RMSD between two sets of atoms
Command :: rock :: General Controls :: rock models back and forth
Command :: roll :: General Controls :: continuously turn model(s) about an axis
Command :: runscript :: General Controls :: run a Python script with arguments
Command :: select :: General Controls :: select models or parts thereof
Command :: ~select :: General Controls :: unselect models or parts thereof
Command :: set :: General Controls :: set various global parameters
Command :: ~set :: General Controls :: revert various global parameters to their default value
Command :: setattr :: General Controls :: set Python attribute values for structure elements
Command :: show :: Viewing Controls :: display (parts of) a model
Command :: display :: Viewing Controls :: display (parts of) a model
Command :: size :: Depiction :: change display size of structural elements
Command :: split :: General Controls :: split a model into multiple models
Command :: stop :: General Controls :: stop an ongoing motion
Command :: style :: Depiction :: change style of depiction for strcutural elements
Command :: sym :: Higher-Order Structure :: generate symmetry mates
Command :: tile :: General Controls :: tile models onto grid
Command :: time :: Utilities :: time execution and redisplay of commands
Command :: transparency :: Depiction :: change transparency of (parts of) models
Command :: turn :: General Controls :: rotate a model about an axis
Command :: undo :: General Controls :: undo a command
Command :: redo :: General Controls :: redo an undone command
Command :: usage :: Utilities :: show the required syntax for a command
Command :: version :: Utilities :: report ChimeraX version number
Command :: view :: Viewing Controls :: change/save/restore 3D view
Command :: wait :: Movie Making :: wait a given amount of frames before executing the next command
Command :: windowsize :: General Controls :: set the size of the 3D window
Command :: wobble :: General Controls :: move models in figure 8 motion
Command :: select zone :: General Controls :: select (parts of) models within a 3D zone
Command :: zoom :: Viewing Controls :: zoom in/out
